aquasimulacra.notes: It looks for enemies within this hitbox.

eyeofperception.notes: It looks for enemies within this hitbox. At the start, the center is Player and starting with the first bounce it's always the enemy that the Bolt is at.
Is done as a chain of attacks starting at the target hit (marking the target for 0.6s) and moving on to the closest enemy that is not marked yet if such an enemy exists.
